definition: generic word for peoples or states of south China or south Asia at different historical periods/abbr. for Vietnam 越南
to exceed/to climb over/to surpass/the more... the more
Democratic Republic of Vietnam (aka North Vietnam), a country in Southeast Asia 1945-1976
pinyin: Yue4 nan2 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2

sentences.english: Vietnam also has reported recent cases of blue ear decease ( disease ).
sentences.chinese: 越南也報告說最近發現藍耳豬的病例。

sentences.english: Vietnam, for example, has already been a beneficiary of escalating labor costs in China.
sentences.chinese: 例如越南已經成爲了中國勞動力成爲上升的受益者。

sentences.english: In Vietnam, consumers are rethinking what to buy for the holiday known locally as Tet.
sentences.chinese: 在越南，消費者們正在重新思考該買些什麼過節。

sentences.english: Thanks for viewing and the support. Did you mean skiing or Vietnamese pho?
sentences.chinese: 謝謝你的觀看與支持，你是指滑雪還是越南河粉？

sentences.english: In April 1975, South Vietnam surrendered to the North and Vietnam was reunited.
sentences.chinese: 1975年4月，南越向北越投降，越南統一。

sentences.english: She said that Vietnamese authorities are evaluating the events in Hue.
sentences.chinese: 她表示，越南當局正在評估順化所發生的事件。

sentences.english: I consider Vietnamese pho, Middle Eastern shawarmas and all that stuff to be fast food as well.
sentences.chinese: 我認爲越南米線，中東烤肉也算是快餐。

sentences.english: In China, Overseas Chinese Farm is the most significant organization that collectively settled the returned Vietnamese Chinese refugees.
sentences.chinese: 華僑農場是中國安頓越南歸難僑最集中的社區。

sentences.english: Hence, I decided to give only 10,000 VND as tip.
sentences.chinese: 因此，我決定放棄只有10，000越南盾作爲小費。

sentences.english: In 2009, a team of British cavers investigated a recently uncovered cave in a remote Vietnamese jungle.
sentences.chinese: 年，一羣英國洞窟專家到越南中部森林深處探險。

sentences.english: Vietnamese know how to kick out of big countries .
sentences.chinese: 越南人知道如何狠揍大國。

sentences.english: China's maritime rescue teams will continue to help search and rescue Vietnamese victims and survivors.
sentences.chinese: 中國海上搜救部門將繼續幫助搜救越南遇險漁民。

sentences.english: Viet Nam is contiguous to China.
I was thrilled with anxieties and anticipation before leaving Japan," she wrote.
sentences.chinese: 去越南之前，我激動不已，對此行充滿了渴望和期待。

sentences.english: There are small islands that China has seized from Vietnam in during the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 越戰期間中國曾佔領了越南一些小島嶼。

sentences.english: Our textbook only skims the surface of the Vietnam War.
sentences.chinese: 我們的教科書對越南戰爭的描述只是輕描淡寫。

definition: Indonesia (abbr. for 印度尼西亞|印度尼西亚)
Ho Chi Minh City a.k.a. Saigon, Vietnam
